name: The song of Nastaliq
description:
Iranian calligraphy is one of the historical arts of Iran and is an example of good Iranian culture.
Nastaliq is the main line of the Persian writing tradition after the Sassanids and is equally important in areas influenced by its culture.
In this work, I have combined one of the Persian letters (ر) in the Nasta'liq line with the shape of a bird to achieve an abstract art.
